title: Where the fucl is KeenRush?! Answer's here.
content:
I'm currently writing this message from some web-cafe in..

AUSTRALIA

That's right. I'm over 15000 kilometres away from home, travelling alone, and staying at people who I have never met (and most of them never met even online).
So, this is the reason why I have been offline so much. I haven't had either time to surf or free internet access. I must be brief since time is ticking and I don't want to pay an extra Australian dollar.

It's been quite fun, indeed. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-yorp.gif[/img] I've felt down right on my knees once again, my knees are bruised. (Hopefully correct word.) Ouch..

I didn't tell about this trip because I was going to meet Spleen and visit ShedQuarters and we were going to surprise you all.. Haha.. Ironically that won't happen now because some four aboriginal youths stole my and my (new) friend's wallets (and also punched my friend a few times).. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-sad.gif[/img]
I'm currently in Melbourne.. Going back to Sydney soon.

I'll be back on track (home) on 23rd..

--KR [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-garg.gif[/img]

PS. Those who know the reason why I'm in Australia, please do NOT tell it! Cheers. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-mischief.gif[/img] 3D Realms: "Do you think there'll ever be a sequel to your game(s)?"
Tom Hall: "If I owned Keen, there sure would be. I don't consider that GBA game canon by any means."

title: Re: Where the fucl is KeenRush?! Answer's here.
content:
Hmm.. it's official the first KeenCon will be held in Australia! (Or it almost was...)

Well congratulations on an (almost) fun sounding trip! You should have TOTALLY punched him in the face back. Seriously... I don't care if I would loose (Which I doubt.) I would bash some heads or balls if someone tried to steal my wallet.-----------------------
[url=http://Galaxie.Spatang.com][img]http://i34.photobucket.com/albums/d134/Galaxieretter/New-blegd-smeeg-banner-60.png[/img][/url]

title: Re: Where the fucl is KeenRush?! Answer's here.
content:
Wow. Really? Omg.

I mean... yeah, damn @ wallet stealage. KeenRush is three measly hours away and about to vanish again.

We were going to gather in Melbourne and catch up with Spike and whoever else we could find, but there wouldn't have been enough time to do that and come back to Lakes (only four days), so the plan was for KR to come down here. By the time misfortune struck, it was too late to make alternative plans.

Oh, well. Someday.

title: Re: Where the fucl is KeenRush?! Answer's here.
content:
Blast! I woudld've loved to see that conference, all I can do here is stalk TMST, its not the same.

A proud member of the Spleen Extinction society

[img]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v410/Gannalev/rcwn.png[/img]

"No one should be here."
-Levellord

title: Re: Where the fucl is KeenRush?! Answer's here.
content:

"Now I'm curious what's the real reason to go to Australie, not only for a little Keen meeting I suppose."
As I said, there is another reason for this trip.. But a Keen meeting surely would've been fun..
[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-surprise.gif[/img] Ret8, you sure know me!

And, with 'youths' I meant in this context guys about of age 18-21.. If I had tried something stupid like attacking them I'd be now in some hospital, most probably. Or dead.3D Realms: "Do you think there'll ever be a sequel to your game(s)?"
